T02TD2141E:210a-1: aa ba ra mi ta a'a yurdzh'a na mandal bidhi n'a ma /
T02TD2141E:210a-3: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD2141E:210a-4: bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2141E:210a-5: rang bzhin tshe dpag med pa'i sku //
T02TD2141E:210a-6: ye shes lnga ldan gsung gi bdag / thugs rje'i thugs kyis rjes 'dzin pa'i //
T02TD2141E:210a-7: bla ma tshe dpag med la 'dud //
T02TD2141E:210a-8: rtsa rgyud bshad rgyud las byung ba'i //
T02TD2141E:210a-9: cho ga bzang pos yongs bzung bshad //
T02TD2141E:210a-10: slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing //
T02TD2141E:210a-11: gzhan phan sgrub pa'i blo gros can //
T02TD2141E:210a-12: rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub phyir /
T02TD2141E:210a-13: yid 'ang nyams dga'i gnas nyid du //
T02TD2141E:210a-14: lha yi rnal 'byor gsal ba dang //
T02TD2141E:210a-16: rab 'bring mtshan ma thob pa dang //
T02TD2141E:210a-17: slob mas me tog dang bcas pas //
T02TD2141E:210a-18: gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD2141E:210a-19: de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir //
T02TD2141E:210a-20: sa gzhi brtags shing bzung dang sbyang //
T02TD2141E:210a-21: nyes pa med pa'i sa phyogs der //
T02TD2141E:210a-22: bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal byas nas //
T02TD2141E:210a-23: bam las bskyed pa'i lha mo ser //
T02TD2141E:210a-24: mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan lus phyed snang //
T02TD2141E:210a-25: bum pa 'dzin la mchod cing bstod //
T02TD2141E:210a-26: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2141E:210a-27: spyod ba'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02TD2141E:210a-28: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD2141E:210b-0: lha @210b mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur //
T02TD2141E:210b-1: skyob ba sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD2141E:210b-2: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar //
T02TD2141E:210b-3: de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las //
T02TD2141E:210b-4: rgyal par byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2141E:210b-5: lag pa sa la bsnun pa yis //
T02TD2141E:210b-6: dga' ba'i mdangs ldan lha mo yis //
T02TD2141E:210b-7: khyod ni slob dpon mchog yin gyis //
T02TD2141E:210b-8: dkyil 'khor las ni rab tu bsgrubs //
T02TD2141E:210b-9: brjod nas sa la thim pa ltar //
T02TD2141E:210b-10: phyogs skyong gtor ma 'bul ba dang //
T02TD2141E:210b-11: mthun pa'i grogs dang gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2141E:210b-12: ro bsal nyes pa spangs pa de //
T02TD2141E:210b-13: 'thas par bcag cing rnam lnga dang //
T02TD2141E:210b-14: bdud rtsi lnga ni khyab par byug / me yis zhi ba'i las kun gyi //
T02TD2141E:210b-15: sbyin sreg sbyangs dang sngags kyis ni //
T02TD2141E:210b-16: phyin brlabs lha yi khang par bsam //
T02TD2141E:210b-17: bskyed pa'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas //
T02TD2141E:210b-19: slob ma gus pas sbos thogs te //
T02TD2141E:210b-20: mchod cing bstod dang gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2141E:210b-21: bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med //
T02TD2141E:210b-22: skyon gyis ma gos li khri ltar //
T02TD2141E:210b-23: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku mda' ba //
T02TD2141E:210b-24: mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2141E:210b-25: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad ni //
T02TD2141E:210b-26: yon tan ma lus bskyed mdzad cing //
T02TD2141E:210b-27: yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs ldan pa'i //
T02TD2141E:210b-29: tshe dpag med pa gsung gi bdag /'chi bdag ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2141E:210b-30: tshe yi dngos grub stsol ba'i sku //
T02TD2141E:210b-31: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2141E:210b-32: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02TD2141E:210b-33: dkyil 'khor bsdus te rta mchog sku //
T02TD2141E:210b-34: khro zhing rab brjid nga rgyal dang //
T02TD2141E:210b-35: rkang pa h'um las rdo rjer byas //
T02TD2141E:210b-36: mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba ste //
T02TD2141E:210b-37: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2141E:210b-38: 'jigs med byang shar mtshams song nas //
T02TD2141E:210b-39: dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la gnas pa'i //
T02TD2141E:210b-40: lha dang lha min bgegs tshogs nyon //
T02TD2141E:210b-41: nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2141E:210b-42: nga yi bka' las ma 'da' bar //
T02TD2141E:210b-43: bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'gro bar gyis //
T02TD2141E:210b-45: ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba yis //
T02TD2141E:210b-46: mgo bo tshar pa brgyar 'gas shing//
T02TD2141E:211a-0: @211a * // lus rnams stod du gyur nas ni //
T02TD2141E:211a-1: rnam par 'joms par gdon mi za //
T02TD2141E:211a-2: de bas khyed rnams gzhan du dengs //
T02TD2141E:211a-3: rta mchog sngags dang rdo rje 'gros //
T02TD2141E:211a-4: dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor bar bya //
T02TD2141E:211a-5: de nas khro po'i phur pa rnams //
T02TD2141E:211a-6: k'i la ya zhes btab nas kyang //
T02TD2141E:211a-7: a'a ko ta yis brdung bar bya //
T02TD2141E:211a-8: me da'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2141E:211a-9: sa yi lha dang lha tshogs rnams //
T02TD2141E:211a-10: sta gon gnas par bya ba ni //
T02TD2141E:211a-11: lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-12: mchod cing bstod de spos thogs la //
T02TD2141E:211a-13: bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med //
T02TD2141E:211a-14: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-15: rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can //
T02TD2141E:211a-16: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs kun //
T02TD2141E:211a-17: thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2141E:211a-18: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-19: slob ma rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2141E:211a-20: rdo rje can bdag che ge zhes //
T02TD2141E:211a-21: dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02TD2141E:211a-22: rjes su brtse bar nyer dgongs nas //
T02TD2141E:211a-24: de nas phyi nang mchod pas mchod //
T02TD2141E:211a-26: rin chen rgyu las byung ba yis //
T02TD2141E:211a-27: lto che mgrin pa ring ba dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-28: mchu 'phyangs nag nog ra ri med //
T02TD2141E:211a-29: lha grangs mnyam pa las bum dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-30: rang rang phyag mtshan rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2141E:211a-31: ha sa de ba gser dngul dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-32: mu tig mu men byi ru gzhug / nas til gros sran mungga dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-33: ga pur dz'a ti gur gum mchog / tsandan gnyis dang aa ga ru //
T02TD2141E:211a-34: mar dang bu ram sbrang rtsi dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-35: lan tshva rnams kyis lto ba dgang //
T02TD2141E:211a-36: kha tshar ma nyams ras zung gis //
T02TD2141E:211a-37: mgrin par rab tu brgyan pa dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-38: kha rgyan ku sha 'bras bu can //
T02TD2141E:211a-39: sna tshogs padma ras kyi steng //
T02TD2141E:211a-40: yang na ku sha'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD2141E:211a-41: bhr'um las bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2141E:211a-42: chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan stengs su //
T02TD2141E:211a-43: lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-44: sngags bzlas ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02TD2141E:211a-45: bum pa gang bar bsam pa dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-46: lha rnams rang rang bstod pa bya //
T02TD2141E:211a-47: las bum rta mgrin bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2141E:211a-48: sngags bzlas par chad bsrung ba dang //
T02TD2141E:211b-0: sha lnga bdud rtsi'i gtor mas @211b mchod //
T02TD2141E:211b-1: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2141E:211b-2: slob ma lhag par gnas pa yang //
T02TD2141E:211b-3: snyim pa me tog dang bcas pa //
T02TD2141E:211b-4: skye rgas 'chi ba na kra yi //
T02TD2141E:211b-5: chu srin la sogs 'jigs rung ba //
T02TD2141E:211b-6: srid pa'i mtsho las bdag sgrol mdzod //
T02TD2141E:211b-7: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po //
T02TD2141E:211b-8: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2141E:211b-9: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i //
T02TD2141E:211b-10: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2141E:211b-11: dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2141E:211b-12: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2141E:211b-13: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2141E:211b-14: skyabs gsum de ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2141E:211b-15: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2141E:211b-17: 'od kyis bur byas sdig pa sbyangs //
T02TD2141E:211b-18: bu tshur theg pa chen po pa //
T02TD2141E:211b-19: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02TD2141E:211b-20: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02TD2141E:211b-21: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD2141E:211b-22: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD2141E:211b-23: sangs rgyas dus gsum 'byung ba rnams //
T02TD2141E:211b-24: rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas //
T02TD2141E:211b-25: ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes //
T02TD2141E:211b-26: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD2141E:211b-27: drag po chen po bdud kyi sde //
T02TD2141E:211b-28: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02TD2141E:211b-29: de bas kun ma khyed thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2141E:211b-30: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02TD2141E:211b-31: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs kun //
T02TD2141E:211b-32: sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga bya //
T02TD2141E:211b-33: tshe dpag med pa bdag la dgongs //
T02TD2141E:211b-34: ma lus bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD2141E:211b-35: 'di nyid nas bzung sangs rgyas par //
T02TD2141E:211b-36: bla med bdag la gzigs par mdzod //
T02TD2141E:211b-37: dam tshig sngom pa bzung ba ni //
T02TD2141E:211b-38: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2141E:211b-39: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2141E:211b-40: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni //
T02TD2141E:211b-41: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya //
T02TD2141E:211b-42: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2141E:211b-43: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2141E:211b-44: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya //
T02TD2141E:211b-45: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2141E:211b-46: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2141E:211b-47: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2141E:211b-48: nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu //
T02TD2141E:211b-49: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2141E:211b-50: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2141E:211b-51: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02TD2141E:211b-52: phyi dang gsang pa'i theg pa gsum//
T02TD2141E:212a-0: @212a * // dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bya //
T02TD2141E:212a-1: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2141E:212a-2: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2141E:212a-3: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2141E:212a-4: mchod pa'i las kyang mi nus bgyi //
T02TD2141E:212a-5: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD2141E:212a-6: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2141E:212a-7: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2141E:212a-8: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2141E:212a-9: gnyis su med pa'i tshangs spyod dang //
T02TD2141E:212a-10: rang gi dam tshig bsrung par bgyi //
T02TD2141E:212a-11: bdag gi dge ba'i las kyis ni //
T02TD2141E:212a-12: sangs rgyas myur du bsgrub bya ste //
T02TD2141E:212a-13: sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las //
T02TD2141E:212a-14: bla med gnas su bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2141E:212a-15: gus pas lan gsum brjod par bya //
T02TD2141E:212a-16: dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga ru //
T02TD2141E:212a-17: dri yi thig le gsum byas te //
T02TD2141E:212a-18: rta bdun chu skyes 'khor lo'i ster //
T02TD2141E:212a-19: thugs gsung sku yi snying pos brgyan //
T02TD2141E:212a-21: ye shes gnyis su med par bstim //
T02TD2141E:212a-22: chu gnyis sngon du 'gro bas mchod //
T02TD2141E:212a-23: deng nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis //
T02TD2141E:212a-24: 'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par //
T02TD2141E:212a-25: mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni //
T02TD2141E:212a-26: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / aa shvadtha dad pa la sha //
T02TD2141E:212a-27: au du mw'a ra la sogs pa //
T02TD2141E:212a-28: bcu gnyis sor gyi tshad tsam la //
T02TD2141E:212a-29: rtse mor me tog gis brgyan nas //
T02TD2141E:212a-30: mandal 'dab brgyad rnam lngas byug / shar nas dbus su dor ba ni //
T02TD2141E:212a-31: padma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa //
T02TD2141E:212a-32: steng du mchog gi dngos grub yin //
T02TD2141E:212a-33: phyogs su phrin las grub pa dang //
T02TD2141E:212a-35: mtshams su 'jig rten dngos grub po //
T02TD2141E:212a-36: de nas skyor chu spyin pa ni //
T02TD2141E:212a-37: aom hr'i: bi shuddha rma'a: sarba p'a p'a ni ts'a sya bi sho ngha ya sarba bi kal p'a na aa pa na ya h'um /
T02TD2141E:212a-38: zhes pas sgo gsum dag sbyangs nas //
T02TD2141E:212a-39: skud pa dmar po sum sgril la //
T02TD2141E:212a-40: rta mgrin sngags kyis bcing bar bya //
T02TD2141E:212a-41: ku sha gtsang ma sngags dang stan //
T02TD2141E:212a-42: ma nor seng ge'i nyal stangs bzhin //
T02TD2141E:212a-44: mtshan ma gang byung brjod par bya //
T02TD2141E:212a-45: bzad na dngos grub spro ba bskyed //
T02TD2141E:212a-46: ngan na sbyin sreg gis ni bzlog //
T02TD2141E:212a-47: zab cing rgya che'i chos bshad ni //
T02TD2141E:212a-48: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag / au du mw'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02TD2141E:212a-49: brgya lam na ni re 'ga' zhig /'byung ngam yang na mi 'byung srid //
T02TD2141E:212a-50: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02TD2141E:212a-51: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02TD2141E:212a-52: bla ma rdo rje can mchod la //
T02TD2141E:212b-0: nang par @212b langs te dkyil 'khor lha //
T02TD2141E:212b-1: nam mkhar bteg ste thig gdab ste //
T02TD2141E:212b-2: bu mo gtsang ma sngom ldan gyis //
T02TD2141E:212b-3: ras bal las byung bkal ba dang //
T02TD2141E:212b-4: ye shes lnga'am sku gsung thugs //
T02TD2141E:212b-5: aom aa n+yo n+ya aa nug ta sarba dha rm'a //
T02TD2141E:212b-6: brjod nas bsgril bar bya ba ni //
T02TD2141E:212b-7: padma'i snod du bzhag nas kyang //
T02TD2141E:212b-8: mi 'chi lnga yis spangs byas la //
T02TD2141E:212b-9: blo ldan ye shes bstim byas nas //
T02TD2141E:212b-10: nam mkhar ye shes dza dzas gdab //
T02TD2141E:212b-11: sgo yi bcu gnyis cha dang ldan //
T02TD2141E:212b-12: srid kyang khang pa nyis 'gyur la //
T02TD2141E:212b-13: tshangs pa'i las thig drangs pa la //
T02TD2141E:212b-14: aom badzra s'u tra sa ma ye ma ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD2141E:212b-15: tshangs dang zur thig la sogs pa //
T02TD2141E:212b-16: bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan des ;
T02TD2141E:212b-17: / cha ni gang yin rnam par dbye //
T02TD2141E:212b-18: gal te nyes pa'i 'bras bu ni //
T02TD2141E:212b-19: chad na bla ma'i srog g-yo zhing //
T02TD2141E:212b-20: dman lhag nad kyis btab par 'gyur //
T02TD2141E:212b-22: blo ldan nyes pa med par bya //
T02TD2141E:212b-23: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas //
T02TD2141E:212b-24: dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan //
T02TD2141E:212b-25: nyi zla dril bu g-yer khas spras //
T02TD2141E:212b-26: pho brang chu skyes rim pa gnyis //
T02TD2141E:212b-27: mu khyud padma'i phreng ba dang //
T02TD2141E:212b-28: khyams dang phyi rol pa dar dang //
T02TD2141E:212b-29: rdo rje me ri la sogs pa //
T02TD2141E:212b-30: rnam pa ma lus rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2141E:212b-32: padma'i snod du so sor bzhag //
T02TD2141E:212b-33: sa bon bris la ye shes bstim //
T02TD2141E:212b-34: sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2141E:212b-35: sngon po ser po dkar po ljang //
T02TD2141E:212b-37: g-yas skor rgyun ma chad par bri //
T02TD2141E:212b-38: dbang ldan mtshams su drang pa bya //
T02TD2141E:212b-39: padma'i snod kyis steng nas bkab //
T02TD2141E:212b-40: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02TD2141E:212b-41: sems can khams ni ni rab sgrol byed //
T02TD2141E:212b-42: bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med //
T02TD2141E:212b-43: tshon gyi las ni yang dag brtsam //
T02TD2141E:212b-44: me tog dor la mtshan ma brtag / shar sngo lho ser nub dkar po //
T02TD2141E:212b-45: byang phyogs aindra na'i la'i mdog / padma lha snam dmar po'o //
T02TD2141E:212b-46: de ltar rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2141E:212b-47: khrus byas dri zhim lus byugs nas //
T02TD2141E:212b-48: gos bzang brgyan la lan gsum bskor //
T02TD2141E:212b-49: tshe dpag med pa'i nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD2141E:212b-50: shar gyi sgo nas nang du zhugs //
T02TD2141E:212b-51: yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam //
T02TD2141E:212b-53: sa ma ya pra be sha ye h'um //
T02TD2141E:212b-54: rnam rgyal la sogs bum pa rnams //
T02TD2141E:212b-55: gnas dang go rims bzhin du dgod //
T02TD2141E:212b-56: sna tshogs gos dang rgyan phreng sogs //
T02TD2141E:213a-1: pa'i rdzas kyis legs par brgyan //
T02TD2141E:213a-2: dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed //
T02TD2141E:213a-3: ye shes bstims la mchod bstod bya //
T02TD2141E:213a-4: tshogs kyi 'khor los tshim pa dang //
T02TD2141E:213a-5: bar chad zhi phyir shar phyogs su //
T02TD2141E:213a-6: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang //
T02TD2141E:213a-7: slob ma'i cho ga ji lta bar //
T02TD2141E:213a-8: slob dpon bdag nyid dbang dang ldan ;
T02TD2141E:213a-9: / shar gyi phyogs nas 'jug pa dang //
T02TD2141E:213a-10: de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir //
T02TD2141E:213a-11: khrus byas bgegs dang sdig pa sbyang //
T02TD2141E:213a-12: gdong pa ras kyis bkab nas ni //
T02TD2141E:213a-13: du khyod su yin ci la dga' //
T02TD2141E:213a-14: bdag ni skal bzang rigs yin no //
T02TD2141E:213a-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku //
T02TD2141E:213a-16: slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2141E:213a-17: gtso bo lha mor bcas pa yi //
T02TD2141E:213a-18: lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2141E:213a-19: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2141E:213a-20: mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02TD2141E:213a-21: de nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2141E:213a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD2141E:213a-23: tshe dpag med pa'i grong khyer mchog / snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni //
T02TD2141E:213a-24: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya //
T02TD2141E:213a-25: aom a'a kham b'i ra h'um /
T02TD2141E:213a-26: me tog phreng ba gtad pa dang //
T02TD2141E:213a-30: na mo na ma: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2141E:213a-31: shar nas zhugs nas lho nas dbang //
T02TD2141E:213a-32: nub nas chos bshad byas nas ni /
T02TD2141E:213a-33: phrin las sgrub pa la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2141E:213a-34: don du gsol ba gdab pa ni //
T02TD2141E:213a-35: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza au pa th'a na ya a'a tma nam /
T02TD2141E:213a-37: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa tva aa nghi tishtha na sva mam /
T02TD2141E:213a-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she ka ta a'a tma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD2141E:213a-39: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra rtna aa bhishi nytsa m'am /
T02TD2141E:213a-40: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra bar ngha na ya a'a tma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD2141E:213a-41: sarba ta th'a ga t'a badzra dha rma nam pra war dha ya mam /
T02TD2141E:213a-42: sarba ta th'a ga t'a p'u dza ka rm'a nam /
T02TD2141E:213a-43: a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD2141E:213a-44: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru mam //
T02TD2141E:213a-45: dam tshig sngom pa sbyin pa dang //
T02TD2141E:213a-46: rnal 'byor du ni sems bskyed do //
T02TD2141E:213a-47: aom sarba yo ga tsi tta aud p'a da y'a mi //
T02TD2141E:213a-48: rdo rje snying gar bzhag / aom su ra te sa ma ya stam //
T02TD2141E:213a-49: siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham//
T02TD2141E:213a-51: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //
T02TD2141E:213a-52: tshe dpag med kyi dngos grub thob //
T02TD2141E:213a-53: dngos grub gzhan dag lta ci smos //
T02TD2141E:213a-55: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re //
T02TD2141E:213a-56: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02TD2141E:213a-57: gal te khyod kyis smras gyur na //
T02TD2141E:213a-58: dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje yis //
T02TD2141E:213b-1: tshe dpag med pa ded khyod kyi //
T02TD2141E:213b-2: snying la de ring yang dag zhugs //
T02TD2141E:213b-3: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2141E:213b-4: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2141E:213b-5: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2141E:213b-6: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD2141E:213b-7: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub rnams //
T02TD2141E:213b-8: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub badzra au da ka aom a'a: h'um /
T02TD2141E:213b-9: deng nas brtsams nas bu khyod kyi //
T02TD2141E:213b-10: tshe dpag med pa da yin gyis //
T02TD2141E:213b-11: khyod kyis ngal brnyas pa na //
T02TD2141E:213b-12: mi bde ma spangs dus byas nas //
T02TD2141E:213b-13: dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re //
T02TD2141E:213b-14: de nas slob ma'i gtso bo yis //
T02TD2141E:213b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2141E:213b-16: bdag la byin gyis rlobs mdzod la ;
T02TD2141E:213b-17: / tshe dpag med pa dbab par mdzod //
T02TD2141E:213b-18: rkang mthil rlung gi dkyil 'khor dzheem //
T02TD2141E:213b-19: snying gar lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor //
T02TD2141E:213b-20: mgrin par bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2141E:213b-21: spyi bor yam las rlung dang ham //
T02TD2141E:213b-22: de yi spyi bor tshe dpag med //
T02TD2141E:213b-23: yab yum 'od kyi rang bzhin du //
T02TD2141E:213b-24: gar byed sku las ye shes kyi //
T02TD2141E:213b-25: bdud rtsi babs nas sku la thim //
T02TD2141E:213b-26: zag med bde bas gang bar bsgom //
T02TD2141E:213b-27: aom hr'i: bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she a'a be sha ya a'a be sha ya aa /
T02TD2141E:213b-29: ra ra ra tsa la ya h'um aa ha: dzhyeem /
T02TD2141E:213b-30: zhes brjod rol mo'i sgra dang ni //
T02TD2141E:213b-31: gu gul zla mtshan thod pa ru //
T02TD2141E:213b-32: dur khrod sol ba'i me yis bsreg / bab gyur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2141E:213b-33: aa: las gsung gi bdud rtsi bsam /
T02TD2141E:213b-35: dge dang mi dge la sogs pa //
T02TD2141E:213b-36: smros shig rdo rje can gyi rigs //
T02TD2141E:213b-37: ti shtha badzra brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2141E:213b-38: tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2141E:213b-39: rig pa'i me tog 'di dor bas //
T02TD2141E:213b-40: sngon tshe ye shes brnyes pa'i lha //
T02TD2141E:213b-41: gang yin de la 'bab par shog /
T02TD2141E:213b-43: bye brag dang dngos grub brtag par bya //
T02TD2141E:213b-44: prti grihna hi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la //
T02TD2141E:213b-45: slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya //
T02TD2141E:213b-46: tshe dpag med pa deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2141E:213b-47: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD2141E:213b-48: phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2141E:213b-49: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2141E:213b-50: aom badzra ne tra aa la har ba talam hr'i: //
T02TD2141E:213b-52: nga ni dad pas rab tu bskyed //
T02TD2141E:213b-53: khyod ni tshe dpag med du skye //
T02TD2141E:213b-54: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2141E:213b-55: 'gro don phun tshogs dngos grub kyang //
T02TD2141E:213b-56: thams cad khyod la mngon du 'gyur //
T02TD2141E:213b-57: dngos grub thob cing dam tshig srungs //
T02TD2141E:214a-0: @214a * // gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyes //
T02TD2141E:214a-1: rim gyis rnam par dag pa bstan //
T02TD2141E:214a-2: de nas slob ma dang ldan des //
T02TD2141E:214a-3: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD2141E:214a-4: yon mchog dam pa 'bul ba dang //
T02TD2141E:214a-5: dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2141E:214a-6: bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med //
T02TD2141E:214a-7: yab yum gnyis dang bde chen sku //
T02TD2141E:214a-8: 'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis //
T02TD2141E:214a-9: dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2141E:214a-10: lan gsum brjod nas shar phyogs su //
T02TD2141E:214a-11: padma 'dab brgyad khri la 'dug / rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs nas //
T02TD2141E:214a-12: chu rnams dung chos bum par bsdus //
T02TD2141E:214a-13: rdo rje'i glu dang rol mo'i sgra //
T02TD2141E:214a-14: rigs lnga rig ma'i lha mo dang /
T02TD2141E:214a-15: byang chub sems dpa' bkra shis brjod //
T02TD2141E:214a-16: khro bo rnams kyis bgegs bsrung ngo //
T02TD2141E:214a-17: gsang gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i //
T02TD2141E:214a-18: ye shes bdud rtsi'i dri ma med //
T02TD2141E:214a-19: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD2141E:214a-20: mi bskyod rdo rje dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2141E:214a-21: aom badzra aa nghi tishtha dzny'a na aa bhishvnytsa h'um /
T02TD2141E:214a-22: gser la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan la //
T02TD2141E:214a-23: rin 'byung bskyed cing ye shes bstim //
T02TD2141E:214a-24: dar dpyangs bcings la tshig 'di brjod //
T02TD2141E:214a-25: thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa //
T02TD2141E:214a-26: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags pa'i //
T02TD2141E:214a-27: rin chen dbu rgyan dam pa dang //
T02TD2141E:214a-28: dar dpyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya //
T02TD2141E:214a-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ra tna mu ku ta aa bhi shinytsa m'am //
T02TD2141E:214a-30: rin chen la sogs rdo rje la //
T02TD2141E:214a-31: snang ba mtha' yas bskyed cing bstim //
T02TD2141E:214a-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2141E:214a-33: di ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2141E:214a-34: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2141E:214a-35: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis zung //
T02TD2141E:214a-36: aom badzra aa nghi pa ti stvam /
T02TD2141E:214a-38: dril bu don grub skyed byas la //
T02TD2141E:214a-39: ye shes bstims la tshig 'di brjod //
T02TD2141E:214a-40: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi //
T02TD2141E:214a-41: 'gro don mnyam med byed pa yi //
T02TD2141E:214a-42: mchod pa'i phrin las rdzogs byed pa'i //
T02TD2141E:214a-43: dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2141E:214a-44: aom aa nghi pa ta ye aa bhishinytsa m'am //
T02TD2141E:214a-45: slob ma aom las rnam snang bskyed //
T02TD2141E:214a-46: ye shes spyan drangs gnyis su med //
T02TD2141E:214a-47: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2141E:214a-48: byang chub snying po'i bar du ni //
T02TD2141E:214a-49: cis kyang gzhom par mi nus pa'i //
T02TD2141E:214a-50: rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags //
T02TD2141E:214a-51: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhishe ka ta m'am //
T02TD2141E:214a-52: chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang //
T02TD2141E:214a-53: dril bu dang ni ming gi dbang //
T02TD2141E:214a-54: rig pa yi ni dbang lnga'o //
T02TD2141E:214a-55: nyon mongs lnga ni rnam dag pas //
T02TD2141E:214a-56: dbang bskur lnga ni thob pa yin //
T02TD2141E:214a-57: ma rig pa las 'das nas kyang //
T02TD2141E:214b-0: ye shes lnga ni rim gyis @214b thob ;
T02TD2141E:214b-1: / de nas spyi bo mgrin po dang //
T02TD2141E:214b-2: snying ga lte ba gsang gnas rnams //
T02TD2141E:214b-3: 'khor lo lnga yig nas nyid du //
T02TD2141E:214b-4: rigs lnga tshe dpag med rnams kyi //
T02TD2141E:214b-5: dbang bskur lha rnams yab yum ste //
T02TD2141E:214b-6: 'chi med byang chub sems su gyur //
T02TD2141E:214b-7: rtsa gsum 'khor lo lnga rnams gang //
T02TD2141E:214b-8: byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2141E:214b-9: 'chi med rdo rje'i lus su gyur //
T02TD2141E:214b-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom //
T02TD2141E:214b-11: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2141E:214b-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad //
T02TD2141E:214b-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2141E:214b-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam dha ra ya mi badzra tva hi hi h'um h'um /
T02TD2141E:214b-15: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2141E:214b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD2141E:214b-17: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2141E:214b-18: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / dpa' mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o //
T02TD2141E:214b-19: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi /
T02TD2141E:214b-20: shes rab dbyings kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02TD2141E:214b-21: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad //
T02TD2141E:214b-22: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02TD2141E:214b-23: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis dngos bral byas //
T02TD2141E:214b-24: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2141E:214b-25: mchog gi srid pa byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2141E:214b-26: mtshan ma med par 'gro ba'i don //
T02TD2141E:214b-27: gang dag bdag gis byed nus pas //
T02TD2141E:214b-28: phyir mi ldog pa dbang bskur che //
T02TD2141E:214b-29: dpa' bo chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2141E:214b-30: shar du seng ge'i khril 'dug / steng du gdugs dkar phub nas kyang //
T02TD2141E:214b-31: rnam rgyal bum pas dbang bskur te //
T02TD2141E:214b-32: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po la //
T02TD2141E:214b-33: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas te //
T02TD2141E:214b-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02TD2141E:214b-35: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02TD2141E:214b-36: aom badzra aa bhi she ka ta aa bhi shinytsa m'am //
T02TD2141E:214b-37: dril bu glegs bam lag tu gtang //
T02TD2141E:214b-38: phrin las thogs pa med pa rnams //
T02TD2141E:214b-39: bu yis gzhan don bla med byos //
T02TD2141E:214b-40: khyod ni rdo rje slob dpon yin //
T02TD2141E:214b-41: chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2141E:214b-42: lha yi snying po lan gsum brjod //
T02TD2141E:214b-43: me tog phreng ba spyi bor bzhag / bcom ldan bdag gis gzung lags kyis //
T02TD2141E:214b-44: bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2141E:214b-45: bcom ldan bdag gis sbyin lags kyis //
T02TD2141E:214b-47: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par //
T02TD2141E:214b-48: sems can ma lus drang ba'i phyir //
T02TD2141E:214b-49: chags pa med pa'i bsam pa yis //
T02TD2141E:214b-50: ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la //
T02TD2141E:214b-51: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
T02TD2141E:214b-52: de bzhin rigs kyis gang 'dul ba //
T02TD2141E:214b-53: khyod kyi phrin las mchog yin no //
T02TD2141E:215a-2: zhi rgyas dbang dang bsad pa dang //
T02TD2141E:215a-3: dgug dang bcing dang bsreg pa dang //
T02TD2141E:215a-4: bskrad dang dbye ba la sogs pa //
T02TD2141E:215a-5: phrin las sna tshogs grub par gyis //
T02TD2141E:215a-6: ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang //
T02TD2141E:215a-7: mchi la lha ma de bzhan ri lu ste //
T02TD2141E:215a-8: mi snang bcud len mkha' la spyod //
T02TD2141E:215a-9: thun mong dngos grub ma lus pa //
T02TD2141E:215a-10: de dag khyod kyis grub par bya //
T02TD2141E:215a-11: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2141E:215a-12: 'jig rten rab ri bsel ba ltar //
T02TD2141E:215a-13: bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2141E:215a-14: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2141E:215a-15: aom badzra ne tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i:/
T02TD2141E:215a-16: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2141E:215a-17: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD2141E:215a-18: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2141E:215a-19: chos rnams de ltar shes par gyis //
T02TD2141E:215a-20: ho: yis mda' gzhu phyogs bzhir 'phangs //
T02TD2141E:215a-21: mtshan mo gnas khang dben pa ru //
T02TD2141E:215a-22: bzhin bzangs mig yangs lang tshor ldan //
T02TD2141E:215a-23: lus la dri yis byugs byas te //
T02TD2141E:215a-24: rtse dang dgod pa la sogs pas //
T02TD2141E:215a-25: thabs dang shes rab gnyis phab ste //
T02TD2141E:215a-26: nor bu byang chub sems ltung bas //
T02TD2141E:215a-27: nya phyis dung chos la sogs su //
T02TD2141E:215a-28: drir bcas slob ma'i kha ru ni //
T02TD2141E:215a-29: mthe bo srin lag dag gis sbyin //
T02TD2141E:215a-30: aa ho su khas de btung ngo //
T02TD2141E:215a-31: zag med bde chen lus la rgyas //
T02TD2141E:215a-32: rdo rje de yis nyon mongs 'joms //
T02TD2141E:215a-33: mtshan ldan shes rab rang bzhin te //
T02TD2141E:215a-34: lha mo 'di ni phyag rgya che //
T02TD2141E:215a-35: mtha' yas bde ba sbyin pa mo //
T02TD2141E:215a-36: rnam pa kun du phyag rgya long //
T02TD2141E:215a-37: bu yis bla med mchod par gyis //
T02TD2141E:215a-38: yol bas bar bcad snyoms 'jug gis //
T02TD2141E:215a-39: srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2141E:215a-40: mi rtog ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2141E:215a-41: ltos shig ltos shig sems la ltos //
T02TD2141E:215a-42: sems nyid cir yang grub pa med //
T02TD2141E:215a-43: bsal gzhag dgag sgrub gar yang med //
T02TD2141E:215a-44: 'dis ni rang rig ye shes yin //
T02TD2141E:215a-45: bla ma sprul ba'i skur byas te //
T02TD2141E:215a-46: chos gos bzung la lung bstan bya //
T02TD2141E:215a-47: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2141E:215a-48: srid pa'i mtha' ni grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2141E:215a-49: srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton //
T02TD2141E:215a-50: 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin //
T02TD2141E:215a-51: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi sa ma ya stv'am bhur bhu ba sv'a: //
T02TD2141E:215a-52: khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che //
T02TD2141E:215a-53: rgyal ba'i bdag por brtan pa dang //
T02TD2141E:215a-54: des ni bdud las rnam rgyal zhing //
T02TD2141E:215a-55: grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin //
T02TD2141E:215a-56: deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2141E:215a-57: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2141E:215b-0: di ring sangs rgyas @215b sras su skyes //
T02TD2141E:215b-1: sangs rgyas sras su nga gyur to //
T02TD2141E:215b-2: rta dang glang po ma he dang //
T02TD2141E:215b-3: bu dang chung ma la sogs dbyig / phyag bya bla ma dam pa la //
T02TD2141E:215b-4: ma zhen sems kyis dbul bar bya //
T02TD2141E:215b-5: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mchod byas te //
T02TD2141E:215b-6: tshogs kyis rnal 'byor tshim byas nas //
T02TD2141E:215b-7: lhag mas 'byung po tshim par bya //
T02TD2141E:215b-8: bkra shis brjod cing smon lam gdab //
T02TD2141E:215b-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba sngo ba dang //
T02TD2141E:215b-10: rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD2141E:215b-11: rngul tshon chu bo chen por dor //
T02TD2141E:215b-12: dri bzangs kyis ni thig phyis te //
T02TD2141E:215b-13: lhag chad bskang phyir sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2141E:215b-14: cho ga bzang po yongs bzung 'di //
T02TD2141E:215b-16: bshad rgyud 'od zer dra ba la //
T02TD2141E:215b-17: brten nas grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad //
T02TD2141E:215b-18: de yi dge ba gang yod pa //
T02TD2141E:215b-19: rigs drug sems can ma lus pa //
T02TD2141E:215b-20: tshe dpag med pa'i lam zhugs nas //
T02TD2141E:215b-21: de yi 'bras bu myur thob shog //
T02TD2141E:215b-22: / bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po yongs bzung zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD2141E:215b-25: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta zla ba bzang po dang //
T02TD2141E:215b-26: bod kyi lo ts'a ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te dag par byas so//
